= Introduction =

How to setup your Java environment:

= Setup for 2013 pre-season (using the 2012 toolset) =

Java development environment configuration

Getting started with Java document:
[http://wbrobotics.com/attachments/article/11/Getting%20Started%20with%20Java%20for%20FRC.pdf here]
After installing JDK (step 1 below, see pages 5-7)

= Downloads =
JDK 7u9 with NetBeans 7.2.1, 32 bit verison (EVEN ON 64-bit windows) [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7-netbeans-download-432126.html netbeans]

Install Java WPI update (NetBeans plugins) from: [http://firstforge.wpi.edu/sf/frs/do/viewSummary/projects.wpilib/frs 
JavaWPI]

Note: just enter the XML URL into NetBeans Tools/Plugins/settings, then click check for updates and select the FRC plugins to install.
